description: This file implements the LocalStorageService class, providing methods to load and save purchased audiobook IDs and playback positions using SharedPreferences for local persistence.

classes.name: LocalStorageService
classes.description: A utility class offering static methods to interact with local storage for audiobook purchase statuses and playback positions.

methods.name: loadPurchasedIds
methods.description: Retrieves the set of purchased audiobook IDs from local storage.

methods.name: savePurchasedIds
methods.description: Saves the set of purchased audiobook IDs to local storage.

methods.name: loadPlaybackPositions
methods.description: Loads a map of audiobook IDs to playback positions in milliseconds from local storage.

methods.name: savePlaybackPositions
methods.description: Saves a map of audiobook IDs to playback positions in milliseconds to local storage.
